description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ev293","text":"This protocol details methods for the LRRK2-induced liposome tubulation experiment and its analysis by confocal fluorescence microscopy and negative stained electron microscopy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"37o21","text":"Prepare the samples in a PCR tube with   LRKK2 proteins (WT or mutant full length LRRK2 or RCKW),   liposomes with or without   GMPPNP (or other guanylnucleotides).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":98,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":126,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ca36t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ljto","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"300","error_concentration":false,"guid":"D24CD0A01F8E11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"DB587D201F8E11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"64EF0000223111ED94D7A339400EEDA5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"9rjuh","text":"Note: Liposome tubulation is sensitive to LRRK2 concentration. Too much protein results in more liposome aggregates.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fb4h","text":"Immediately deposit   -  samples of step 1 on a   glass bottom dish and incubate at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3lr7f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b9a0i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"ED69BBA01F8E11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"F21123A01F8E11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"0E273BB01F8F11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":201,"value":"35"}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1CF1B3A01F8F11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"2507DC901F8F11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"5":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"ffcdo","text":"Note: Drop some buffer in the dish to prevent samples from drying out due to evaporation during incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5qhr9","text":"After incubation, capture  images  with a Spinning disk confocal (SDC) microscopy at   on a Nikon Ti-E inverted microscope using the Improvision UltraVIEW VoX system (Perkin-Elmer).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4kbbo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8n2a8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3AE11F901F8F11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":38}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"60t89","text":"Note: Movies were collected from time  .","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":0,"guid":"CAADC0C0223111ED94D7A339400EEDA5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvp6u","text":"Immediately apply   of the mixture to the grid and incubate the mixture at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"955cu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5tb0g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"EB3C85F01F8F11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EEE6C9401F8F11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"F2806AC01F8F11EDA9D08FDF7BDFD1A2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"aiuht","text":"Note: Drop some buffer in the dish to prevent samples from drying out due to evaporation during incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
